name: Boardom
description:
A student imagines an adventure on the chalkboard while daydreaming in a boring class. #ld38 #smallworld

Features:

  • Fifteen puzzles!
  • Secret ending!
  • Speedrun counter! (Jimmy's record is 4.29!)
  • Chalk!!1!

You can also play the game online, here: http://www.animerrill.com/games/jam/boardom

Included in the downloads here are the PC version of the game and all my source material (prepare yourself, it's sloppy) I created using Game Maker. I listed that as Windows only, but in reality it should work for any OS as long as you can use Game Maker on it... I don't think I used any Windows specific functions.

Of course it's all free to download but, eh *cough* feel free to toss a little tip my way if you liked it! ;0

Happy 15th Anniversary, Ludum Dare! It's been a great first jam! I'll definitely plan to make it back for LD39!! >:D
